descriptionText.attr1: The faction less left overs of the criminal variety.
Outcasts, rogues, posers, wannabes, hostile to everyone but other pirates.

Too crazy for a more organized pirate faction? Not crazy enough? Just starting out? It doesn't take much to become a Pirate. Demand ransom for the privilege of crossing your path. If denied, back up your threats with violence and you are on your way.
